storyInfo:
Surtr and Meteorite arrive at the site of their mission, a remote mining community called Bellony Village.
In addition to their mission for Rhodes Island, Surtr is also searching for leads on her past.

attributes.content: 7:10 A.M. \ Clear
Kazdel exurbs
This is the mission location?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Judging by the image, this should be the place. The nomadic hamlet Bellony Village.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Though I think you could just call the entire village an oversized minecart instead.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It's a mining town that carries around its own Originium-powered drills to keep itself going. The people bring in some revenue just selling the excess resources to nearby cities.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: If they find any big ruins, they even ask the larger nomadic cities to front the excavation costs.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Maybe, but this place still looks pretty rough.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: There is dust everywhere and the fences are all run-down. There are obvious signs of habitation, but no one cares to do maintenance?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: I don't see anything worth investigating.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Most of Terra isn't very interesting, but the people living in these uninteresting places still have their own unique lifestyles.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Wait, give that back!
attributes.name: Scrawny Kid

attributes.content: What?! You said you'd share your ice cream!
attributes.name: Mischievous Kid

attributes.content: Stop running! You're gonna squish it before we get home!
attributes.name: Scrawny Kid

attributes.content: Idiot, give that back!
attributes.name: Scrawny Kid

attributes.content: No way! I'm faster than you anyway. I'll be the one to bring it back to Dad!
attributes.name: Mischievous Kid

attributes.content: Wait up!
attributes.name: Scrawny Kid

attributes.content: There are many who struggle to survive in such terrible environments, but that doesn't mean they're unhappy.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: They chase after one another for a mere ice-cream without regard to the commotion they are causing. To think they will be the same when they grow up...
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: You call this happiness?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Are you angry?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Why would some inconsiderate kids running around, kicking up dust anger me?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: (She's totally angry. )
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Sorry. Are you the operators from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Real sorry to keep you waiting.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Yes, we are. Nice to meet you, are you the local liaison?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Ah, yeah, that's right. I'm the leader of Bellony Village. Come with me. No need to stand around out here, let's go in. This way.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Before the mission
Rhodes Island Command Center
Bellony Village is a typical mining community located at the edge of Kazdel. A cave-in a few months ago completely sealed off the mines.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Not only were the mines ruined, the village's travel route and trading channels were also blocked.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For the past few months, the village has been requesting aid from nearby nomadic cities, but there has not yet been any city willing to help.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Meteorite, I would like you to carry out preliminary investigations and report on the situation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We will organize a rescue mission based on that report.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Understood. This doesn't sound like a particularly tough mission.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: The village's problems don't appear to be related to Catastrophes or Oripathy, but don't let your guard down.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Roger that. But...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Is Surtr going too? I don't think I'll need much help.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: There is something I want to investigate in that area.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Surtr asked to go along for personal reasons. We've approved her request.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I won't be a burden to you, just pay me no mind.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: We're a small village. Just wait here for a moment, I'll go and grab some tools first.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Oh, we have some basic prospecting tools with us.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: No good, the mine entrance at the edge of the village has been sealed off with our own special tools.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Without these unlocking tools, it can't be opened. Our village is pretty good at excavation, if I do say so myself.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Even with all that experience, you still got yourselves stuck here.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's true.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Aah! Please forgive her, she doesn't mean it. Hey, don't be rude!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: No, we are really ashamed that for all our experience excavating, we still couldn't stop a major cave-in.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Part of the drill sunk into the collapsed area, so it's not safe to send anyone else over there.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Even with Rhodes Island's help, we're going to put some new precautions in place.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Just rest here a minute, I'll get the stuff.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Alright, please do.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: You know, you could stand to be a little more polite.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I'm just stating facts.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Ah... Err...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: (This is so awkward. )
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: (I've heard Surtr is tough to get along with, but I thought we'd at least have something to talk about. )
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: ......(Recording)
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Are you taking notes for a status report?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: You don't know? I thought my file was public.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: I did read it, but...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Surtr. The file mentioned her.
Due to a memory impairment of unknown origins, she has difficulty reconciling her memories.
It is as if there is a large volume of memories existing simultaneously in her mind. The volume is such that Surtr is unable to properly recognize which of her memories are real and which are false.
And so she has been seeking out the places in her memories one by one.
The 'personal reasons' Dr. Kal'tsit mentioned are some places around here you remember?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: When Dr. Kal'tsit was telling me about this area, I felt a sense of familiarity.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: And I felt some deja vu when looking at photographs and records.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Now that you're here at the village, do you recall anything?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Nothing at all. When walking through the village, I saw the passing children and the run-down houses. They are similar to the images in my memory, yet completely different.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: I do not know why.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Have you checked every spot in the village?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: At a quick glance, I haven't missed anything.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: How about we ask the villagers later? Maybe the village you remember is from a while ago?  It could've been rebuilt.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: ...Perhaps.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: The smell of dried plants in the air is no different from my memories.
When I close my eyes, it is as if I am on familiar streets.
The footsteps of children running by are like the sounds of friends chasing one another in my memories.
Yet when I open my eyes, I see nothing but an unfamiliar landscape.
Dr. Kal'tsit sent me on this mission, so let me help you investigate.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: We'll look for clues in the village together after we're done with the mine collapse thing.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: No need, I can handle it myself.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: ...I understand how it feels to have no past, or a place to call home.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: As Sarkaz, without a Sarkaz home, I'm always fighting, together with the others, pressing on.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: My situation is different.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Maybe it's different, maybe it's the same?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Maybe we're all just looking for a place to belong in the end.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But, as you look towards the unknown future, you can't ignore what's right beside you.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: That's what Amiya taught me.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Sorry for the wait, let's set out now!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: I'm all ready!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Anyway, let's complete our mission first.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: So this is it...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Yep, this is the cave-in. Watch your step.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: The excavation site is over there. The cave-in caused the surrounding area to sink downwards, so this entire area had to be sealed off.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: This cave used to be the entrance to a tunnel that connects to the neighboring village. Now that it's sealed, we can't trade with our neighbors.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Surtr?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I think I remember this path.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Sir, what's the relationship between this village and the neighboring one?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It's a mining village just like ours. Since the nearby villages are all in the same business, we deal with each other a lot.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Some villagers even move back and forth between the communities.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: But the cave-in blocked off our only means of communication. They've probably already moved on to keep mining.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: The course of this path, the direction...
It's getting more familiar.
I used to pass through this place often.
The familiar figures of children run past me and disappear among the piles of rocks up ahead.
You want to go to another village?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: If we got the path open, we could contact them pretty quickly.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: That would be great... Surtr?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I'm not willing to wait that long.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Move aside!
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Surtr, wait! I know you're eager for answers, but the mine isn't safe right now!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Think for a minute before you put yourself in danger!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Meteorite, just wait for me outside and guard the entrance!
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: The girl! She actually smashed through the rubble and rushed in! ?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Hey, wait!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Stop! Don't you go in there too!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: You're risking another cave-in!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Damn it!! Surtr!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Deep within the mine, the traces of heavy machinery are obvious.
The path snakes ahead, as if guiding Surtr forward.
So this is the path to that other village.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: It's just an Originium Slug nest now.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: It looks like they took over the empty space in the past few months.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Troublesome.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Children holding hands walk along the path.
Passing by the countless traces of Originium Slugs.
Disappearing into the darkness ahead.
Huh?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: An explosion!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Another cave-in!?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: That girl is in danger! What do we do! ?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: The streets in my memories were filled with the rich aroma of the earth, not the scent of dried plants.
The companions in my memories would not chase after one another, ice-cream in hand.
The buildings looked the same, yet were completely different.
It was not just minor differences in the design. Even the materials and structures were completely different.
Ah, I'm hurt. Ouch. My palm's scratched.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Never thought there would be a day I got distracted enough to get ambushed by Originium Slugs.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: This... this is...
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: There's another empty space beneath the mining pit?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: (Rustle rustle). It's the sound of Originium Slugs.
(Rustle rustle).
(Rustle rustle).
The ruins of a city in a giant cavern...?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Surtr enters the cavern deep beneath the earth.
Beside the glow of Originium Slugs, she can trace the outlines of buildings among the piles of stone and rubble.
Tiles of a road, bricks of a wall.
It is very clear that the entire place has been buried for a very long time.
Dozens of years? Hundreds of years?
Surtr does not know either. Yet, she has found that which she is looking for.
Here!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Surtr!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Ah, thanks for pinpointing the location. I was able to break the rock layer at the correct spot.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: What were you thinking?! Why would you rush into such a dangerous place all by yourself?!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I was doing a little thing called 'investigating'.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Incidentally, I discovered the cause of the cave-ins. There was a nest of Originium Slugs below the mine, inside a giant cavern.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: The mining put more pressure on the bottom, so the whole thing just collapsed.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: I destroyed the Originium Slug nest and used the cave-in to seal up the entire cavern. Done.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Though we skipped over the standard procedures, the issue was resolved.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: What!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: So, you solved the whole problem by yourself, but you didn't find the path to the neighboring village?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Right, I realized that neither village was the one in my memory.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: I made a mistake. There aren't any memories I'm looking for here.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: You'd mess up something you recorded so diligently all this while?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I suppose I would.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: I've seen something like this before.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: You run into all sorts of problems on the way to your goal.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It's thanks to the people beside me that I've made it this far.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I'm used to it.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: After all, this isn't the first time there was a discrepancy in the places I remember.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: But even if you didn't find the right place today, you still have a place to call home, right?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Are you trying to say I can rely on you too?
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Um, I guess you could put it that way...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Ladies! I've notified the others in the village!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: The exploration team is getting ready! It sounds like you've taken care of things and we can get back to mining.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Please wait for us to bring our data back to Rhodes Island before you go back in there.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: We wouldn't want any more accidents.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's fine. Everyone's too excited. I really have to thank you both.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: If you don't mind, why don't you spend the night in the village?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: You'll be our guests of honor!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: We have to hurry back, so I'm afraid we'll pass.
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Surtr

attributes.content: Could I have an ice-cream?
attributes.name: Surtr
